Reviews.Title: water damage
Reviews.Author: Opal M. Ortiz
Reviews.Content: this phone had excessive water damage.  when i tried to return it, they offered me a small discount instead.  i was only able to use the phone for 2 weeks because the battery wouldn't stay charged and it is so outdated that i wasn't able to purchase another battery from any store.

Reviews.Title: would be nice.........
Reviews.Author: J. Saunders
Reviews.Content: if it actually came with the Sprint logo,Just putting this out there,because this can become false advertisement,contact me asap..you have my email hunted1820,I am not mad ,just a bit pissed off that I did not get what I see here..I just called up sprint to be informed,that they cannot do anything over the phone as far as changing me from my rumor to this 6700,and I was really looking forward to using this ,Asap!!
